## GraphNGProps interface

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export interface GraphNGProps extends Themeable2
```

```typescript
import { GraphNGProps } from '@grafana/ui';
```

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
onLegendClick?: (event: GraphNGLegendEvent) => void;
```

### options property

needed for propsToDiff to re-init the plot &amp; config this is a generic approach to plot re-init, without having to specify which panel-level options should cause invalidation. we can drop this in favor of something like panelOptionsRev that gets passed in similar to structureRev. then we can drop propsToDiff entirely.

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
options?: Record<string, any>;
```

### preparePlotFrame property

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
preparePlotFrame?: (frames: DataFrame[], dimFields: XYFieldMatchers) => DataFrame;
```

